meaningMnemonic:
駆ける is "to gallop" and the kanji 込 means <kanji>into</kanji>. To gallop into a place is <vocabulary>to rush into</vocabulary> it. You can’t gallop slowly, after all.

This can also mean <vocabulary>to seek refuge</vocabulary>, as in hurrying to a place for safety and support.
readingMnemonic: The readings come from 駆ける and 込む.
